ResearchProjectDef.label: Lunar architecture
ResearchProjectDef.description: Coming soon-달의 건축양식과 구조물을 시공하는 기술.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Lunar Sewing
ResearchProjectDef.description: You can make a sewing table for rabbies, and learn how to craft stylish clothes for rabbis. It includes various everyday clothes worn in temperate zones.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Lunar machining
ResearchProjectDef.description: You can create a table that produces weapons and equipment for the moon rabbits..

ResearchProjectDef.label: PDW
ResearchProjectDef.description: Teaches you how to craft a shortened rifle, equipped by rear noncombatant rabbies of the Rabtic Empire. Inexpensive and easy to use.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Weave Moonthread
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn the technique of weaving the lunar synthetic fabric widely used in the Rabbie Empire..

ResearchProjectDef.label: Fieldarmy Weapon
ResearchProjectDef.description: Coming soon - The field forces of the Rabtic Empire craft weapons locally produced on the planet. A weapon system that focuses on overpowering many of the savage level, relatively inexpensive, and uses live ammunition..

ResearchProjectDef.label: Heat transfer chemical gun module
ResearchProjectDef.description: Coming soon - The existing weapons of the Rabitish Empire Field Army are upgraded to electrothermal chemical weapons. Mounting a module on a weapon completely burns more charges, resulting in increased power, penetration, and accuracy..

ResearchProjectDef.label: Composite Gear
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research on how to make combat uniforms, field helmets, and bulletproof jackets worn by the Rabitish Empire field forces.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Efficient clothing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to make garments that improve work efficiency with the synthetic fabric of the moon. Rabbie citizens' occupational clothing, heat shielding, winter clothing, and various hats are included..

ResearchProjectDef.label: Refine Planetarium
ResearchProjectDef.description: We study the method of capturing and purifying the planetarium in the air, mainly called'spices' It is a technology that is directly connected to the survival of rabbis.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Planetarim tea
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to make tea with planetarium.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Mix cocktail
ResearchProjectDef.description: Coming soon-With the unique technique of mixing alcohol and planetarium, you learn to make a cocktail called the Blue Planet.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Officiary clothing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Manufactures clothing worn by public officials of the Labitish Empire. Includes Power Management Bureau staff, general officer uniform, and senior officer command uniform.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Moon heavy industry
ResearchProjectDef.description: Coming soon - We create machinery, defensive turrets, and firepower reinforcement racks developed with lunar heavy industry technology..

ResearchProjectDef.label: Basic energy weapon
ResearchProjectDef.description: Coming soon - We study the single-shot rifle, the first energy weapon developed in the Empire..

ResearchProjectDef.label: Nanomachine Industry
ResearchProjectDef.description: Coming soon - Developing a nanomachine breeding reactor for ultra-precision industries in the lunar city..

ResearchProjectDef.label: Industrial Mass refine
ResearchProjectDef.description: Coming soon - Researching technology to purify a large amount of planetarium to supply to the lunar city.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Nano-tied fabric
ResearchProjectDef.description: Creates Moonsilk, an industrial product of the Rabbi Empire. It is a powerful and beautiful fiber that is squeezed out by nanomachines using fabric and plastic..

ResearchProjectDef.label: 특수 의류
ResearchProjectDef.description: Coming soon - We study high-performance suits and clothing worn by specialists and armored pilots of the Rabbie Empire.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Regulararmy Weapon
ResearchProjectDef.description: Coming soon - Research the weapon systems used by the regular army of the Rabitish Empire. Uses a powerful charged energy bomb..

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Power armor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research on advanced power armor equipped by the Rabitish Empire regular army.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Super Acceleration
ResearchProjectDef.description: Coming soon - With the advanced railgun technology, the weapon of the Rabbie regular army is improved to fire at super acceleration with electromagnetic force. With overwhelming range and penetration, it can penetrate any armor from a distance. The bullet speed that is so fast that the charged particles become plasma helps to hit by reducing the time it takes to hit.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Lunar Armor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Coming soon - Research pilot-mounted armored equipment for war against civilized enemies..
